Chance the Rapper Plays Bob Marley and Erykah Badu Plays Rita Marley in New Episode of Adult Swim’s “Black Dynamite”

posted by Constant Gardner on November 9, 2014 in News, Video

Last night, both Chance The Rapper and Erykah Badu featured on an episode of Adult Swim’s cartoon series Black Dynamite (a lewd, rude show that references and parodies blaxploitation movies) called “How Honeybee Got Her Groove Back.” Chance The Rapper voiced Bob Marley while Badu voiced both Rita Marley and a prostitute. Watch above, or head to the official stream, available with subscription or cable package, here.

In other Chance news, he recently revealed that he’s aiming to release a project called Surf with his band The Social Experiment before the end of the year, while Badu recently did her own little social experiment, singing for money in Times Square and making a paltry $3.60.

 

(Pitchfork)
